name: Dashboard Social Stats
author: Graeme Boy

sections.description: Allows the user to monitor backlinks, alexa rank, and Facebook share right from the user’s WordPress Dashboard.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. View your WordPress Dashboard to see your stats
sections.faq:
Why is it called Dashboard Social Stats?

Because the most likely use of this plugin is for those who are looking to track statistics related to their site’s social reputation.
sections.changelog:
3.0

  • Second Update: Added Facebook Shares, Google Backlinks.

2.0

  • First Update. Updated to: Dashboard Social Stats.

1.0

  • Birth of Monitor SEO Essentials
